text: Besaka alaha unham lokam nu jihare imana li'a'e ate jinham ne cage karama kite, unham nu ajihe bagam vica dakhala karega, jinham de thali'o nahiram vagadi'am honagi'am. Ate jinham ne inakara kita, uha (padaratham da) upabhauga karade hana, jivem pasu khande hana. Inham lokam da tikana aga hai
